title: Public Debt

content.text: (1) All debt charges for which Malta is liable shall be a charge on the Consolidated Fund.

(2) For the purposes of this article debt charges include interest, sinking fund charges, the repayment or amortisation of debt, and all expenditure in connection with the raising of loans on the security of the revenue of Malta or the Consolidated Fund and the service and redemption of debt created thereby.

notes: This article establishes that all debt charges for which Malta is liable are to be charged on the Consolidated Fund, and provides a definition of what constitutes 'debt charges'.
